NAME: Name
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_TITLE: Welcome to the Ionic Super Starter
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION: The Ionic Super Starter is a fully-featured Ionic starter with many pre-built pages and best practices.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_TITLE: How to use the Super Starter
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION: Assemble the various page types you want and remove the ones you don't. We've provided many common mobile app page layouts, like login and signup pages, tabs, and this tutorial page.
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3_DESCRIPTION: Need help? Check out the Super Starter README for a full tutorial
WELCOME_INTRO: The starting point for your next great Ionic app
LOGIN_ERROR: Unable to sign in. Please check your account information and try again.
SIGNUP_ERROR: Unable to create account. Please check your account information and try again.
SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: Search the items list, e.g. "Donald Duck"
MENSAJE_BIENVENIDA: A fast and efficient way to optimize your time.
ANTES_INGRESO: Please Log in or Sign in It is necessary to keep your information secure.
ALERT_REC_PW_CONTENT: A message with your password will be sent to this email.
ERROR_MSN: Sorry an error occurred, please try again later.
ESTADO_ACT_MSN: The status of an activity has been changed to:
SUG_ELIMINAR_MSN: Do you want to delete this element permanently?
ELIMINAR_MSN: The item has been removed successfully.
ACTUALIZAR_MSN: The item has been updated successfully.
GUARDAR_MSN: The item has been saved successfully.
EXISTENCIA_ACT_MSN: There is another activity taking this time range.
FECHA_VALIDACION_MSN: Verify that the dates are greater than the current date, and that the final date is greater than the initial date.
ELIMINAR_RECURRENTES_MSN: By eliminating this activity, all similar activities are deleted in: Start time, End time, name, etc., which are recurrent.
ADVERTENCIA_NOT_PROGRESS: It can not be deleted, this element contains contains linked items. All progress will be deleted.
MSN_INPUT_VERIFICAR_MAYOR_ACTUAL: Verify that the date is greater than the current date.
MSN_INPUT_VERIFICAR_MAYOR_INICIO: Verify that the date is greater than the start date.
